title: Easy to hard

title: hmm...
content: My vote is Keen1 (very easy, only 1 truly difficult level (vacuum)), Keen6 (pretty easy, all dangerous areas are marked as such, all dangerous monsters are put in areas which are avoidable), Keen2 (allows you to turn off lights to avoid most hard stuff), Keen5 (has some challenging areas and traps), Keen4 (has many enemies which are difficult to deal with, and are resistant to stun), Keen3 (Vortininjas destroy me).

title: well...
content:
Even with the single last level you need to play to get the end sequence, I'd consider it the hardest. The Mangling Machine is a more difficult level than any other Keen level in the official games. Meeps which are effectively impossible for you to shoot, but who can shoot back at you? Timed moves under giant squishing limbs? Lasers falling down from the ceiling and distracting you?

It's a tough level--and you don't get any save-load to help you out... not to mention the DOO DOO DOOOOOOOOOOO DOO every time you enter the level. :-)

But yes, combine that single level with countless others which were either not playtested at all, or possibly designed to be played with God mode on... and it's the hardest legit episode of Keen, in my mind.
no xhy its more doo doo doooo de do do[img]http://www.greenftechn.com/brandon/banner2.bmp[/img]

title: Re: (:
content:
I recently got the keen combo cd so have been playing keen like crazy and my order goes...
keen 4 (been playing it since I was seven so I know all the levels off by heart)
keen 1 (only a few tough ones)
keen 3 (haven't played this one much but seems fairly easy)
keen 5 (ouch, this one is hard)
keen 3.2 ( Im not good with the arch of the flowers you throw)
keen 6 (A bug happened where I can't see where I was going after saving on the eyeball in the last room on the last level)
keen 2 ( HOLY CRAP! the Vorticon Warrior Elite's scare the freaking crap out of me! when there is up to four of them running around at a time they are near to impossible to kill, I had no Idea turning the lights off would cease their jumping so I had some major problems but I still cannot beat keen 2 after 2 days!)
